yearly.translation[0].definitions[0].def: happening or appearing every year or once a year
yearly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Salary levels are reviewed on a yearly basis.
The magazine is issued twice yearly  (=two times a year).
yearly.translation[1].definitions[0].def: happening or appearing every year or once a year
yearly.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The computer company reported its best yearly earnings since 2003.
